N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 508.6 - Audits

State Regulations
(a) ACT providers
shall maintain the records which formed the basis of all statistical and
financial reports requested by and submitted to the office for six years from
the date on which the reports were submitted to the office, or longer if
required by Federal law. (b) All
such records shall be subject to audit for six years from the date on which the
reports were filed with the office or due, whichever is later. (c) On-site audits or desk audits shall be
conducted by the office at a time, place and in a manner determined by the
office. (d) The office may enter
into agreements with other organizations or agencies having audit
responsibilities to audit the financial and statistical records of any ACT
provider. Notes
